price: ߛߍ߰ ߕߍ߫ ߡߊ߰ ߟߴߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߦߋ߲߬ ߸ ߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߘߏ߲߬ ߕߍ߫ ߟߊߓߐ߫ ߟߊ߫ ߦߋ߲߬ ߡߎ߬ߕߎ߲߬
arabic: لَا يَمَسُّهُمۡ فِيهَا نَصَبٞ وَمَا هُم مِّنۡهَا بِمُخۡرَجِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: lā yamassuhum fīhā naṣabun wamā hum min'hā bimukh'rajīna
